formula: a(n) = (A062756(n) - A062756(n+1) + 1)/2, where A062756(n) is the number of 1's in the ternary expansion of n. From formula in A062756: g.f.: A(x) = 1/(1-x)/2 - Sum_{k>=0} x^(3^k-1)/(1+x^(3^k)+x^(2*3^k))/2. - _Paul D. Hanna_, Feb 24 2006
Given g.f. A(x) then B(x) = x * A(x) satisfies B(x) = x^2 / (1 - x^3) + B(x^3). - _Michael Somos_, Jul 29 2009
